hits.definition:
船

[chuán] boat, ship; 渡船 dùchuán ferry; 宇宙飞船 yǔzhòu fēichuán "cosmic flying boat" = spaceship

继 (F 繼)

[jì] (= 继续 jìxù) continue; 继承 jìchéng inherit

尚

[shàng] esteem; 高尚 gāoshàng noble, lofty

[shang] 和尚 héshang monk

嘴

[zuǐ] (嘴巴 zuǐba) mouth; 嘴唇 zuǐchún lip

察

[chá] 观察 guānchá observe; 警察 jǐngchá police

雨

[yǔ] rain; 雨水 rainwater; 暴风雨 bàofēngyǔ rainstorm

优 (F 優)

[yōu] excellent; 优良 fine; 优秀 outstanding; 优越 yōuyuè superior

您

[nín] <polite> you; 您贵姓 Nín guìxìng? (May I ask for) your family name, Sir/Madame?

险 (F 險)

[xiǎn] (危险 wēixiǎn) danger; 保险 bǎoxiǎn insurance

烟

[yān] (F 煙) smoke, cigarette, mist

[yīn] (= 氤)

阶 (F 階)

[jiē] (= 台阶) steps; 阶级 class; 军阶 rank; 阶段 phase

担 (F 擔)

[dān] carry on a shoulder pole

[dàn] two buckets full, 50 kg.

散

[sàn] break up, distribute, dispel

[sǎn] fall apart, scattered

板

[bǎn] board, hard, (F 闆) 老板 lǎobǎn shopkeeper,

proprietor, boss

钟

[zhōng] (F 鐘) bell, clock; 三点钟 3 o'clock, (F 鍾) 钟爱 zhōng'ài dote on, <family name>

访 (F 訪)

[fǎng] (=访问 fǎngwèn) visit; 采访 gather material

伸

[shēn] stretch

佛

[Fó] Buddha; 佛教 Fójiào Buddhism

[fú] 仿佛 fǎngfú seem

限

[xiàn] limit, bounds; 有限 limited; 限制 restrict
